You groan, your head hurting as you wake up. Putting a hand to your forehead and tightening your eyes, you try to collect your thoughts against the pain. The first thing you can at least feel is that you have some sort of bedding beneath you.

After your fall, one of your parents must-have taken you to bed. You can't imagine how worried they must be after seeing you lying on the floor unconscious.

Slowly opening your eyes, you're expecting to see a hospital room but things escalate beyond your expectations. Surrounding you are wooden bars that trap you like some sort of crib.

Ignoring the pain in your head, you widen your eyes to see yourself wearing nothing but a shirt and a diaper on your crotch.

Gasping, you lift your head as much as you can to scan the surroundings that lye beyond the crib. Some relief fills you as you recognize that you're in a room, but it's certainly decorated to be more childish.

Nothing appeared wrong with you other than your current apparel.

"What the-"

Before you could finish, a sharp pain hit your head again but this time, it seems to be more mysterious. Unfamiliar new laws fill your brain and if you hadn't kept yourself supported by one of the crib columns, you might have passed out.

Instead, you bear with the intruding new information and once the pain subsided, your face pales. Everything about your current diapered state to the appearance of your room now makes sense.

You're not in the same world as you knew. As for how you got here after falling from stairs, you couldn't know. All you knew is that, like everyone else the same age or younger, you are considered as a "baby".

Legally, a "baby" can be anyone under 18-years-old. After that, the child can choose to move on from being a baby and become an adult, marry, work, wear actual underwear.

Until then, they were under the supervision of their parents or some other guardian. They weren't allowed to change into anything except a diaper or other forms, their diet had to consist of baby food or breast milk, and a parent or a registered nanny had to be present at all times.

Sexual interactions were allowed after 16 under the supervision of another, but what shocked you is that it isn't limited to family. In fact, you knew from memories of some of your friends that they routinely have assisted-masturbation from one of their family members.

This might be a way to encourage their children to remain a baby after 18. While being a baby, the household gains favorable tax benefits if they have at least one baby in the house. For many families, this means that the parents will try hard to keep at least one of the parents while allowing others to grow up.

Of course, being a baby means less responsibilities, having another take care of you, and not having to worry too much about working.

Of course, after 18, a "baby" could graduate and find work if they wished. They'd usually find a job alongside one of their parents so they could be taken care of.

All this information was too much that it left you out of breath.

'Holy shit...' you think.

As you are still a month away from deciding whether to "grow up", you knew that language had to be kept to yourself. This wouldn't be a problem since your parents disapproved pointless words in the house anyway.

There's only one thing that seems odd to you. Although you received new information about this new alternate reality, you didn't receive any new images to that information. That is, you remember the faces of your friends, but couldn't imagine them in diapers. It's the same with your family as you only knew them as you had before. No new memories existed!

You shiver at the thought of being "touched" by your mother, Valorie. She's a 43-year-old woman who definitely hasn't aged well, especially considering she's a smoker.

You have no clue as to how you're treated by her. As for your father, Jason, Valorie divorced him a few years ago on amicable terms. You visit him every week along with his new wife and your step-mother, Ashley, who is effectively a babe in your eyes being only 32-years-old.

"Baby? Are you awake? Mommy's coming in!"

You freeze, hearing a female voice. In your state of panic, as you try to organize things in your mind, you aren't sure who is speaking.

She's leaner, taller, and dare you say it...pretty. For a 42-year-old woman, it's as if she stopped smoking and shed 10, no 15 years off her life!

"M-mom?"
